name: secretory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a body part or disease) causing a liquid to be produced and released: Cystic fibrosis is an inherited disease of the secretory glands, including the glands that make mucus and sweat. Several viruses may cause secretory diarrhoea. Related word
secrete
More examplesFewer examplesSecretory vesicles carry the enzymes to the cell surface and release their contents.With no progesterone production, no secretory endometrium is formed.Doctors pinpointed the cancer as an invasive secretory carcinoma.
